Title: 40927 - # Reasons to Run Your Startup Through the Cloud
Direction: 675 words. Give 4-8 different reasons that someone who has a startup company would want to consider running their business through the cloud. You should discuss all of the benefits, convenience, and ease of using online cloud software for business management. You can talk about different kinds of cloud software such as online accounting software, which will allow you to easily link to the client URL. Your target audience is startup business owners, and the placement site gives information, tips, and advice to those looking to run a successful startup company.
Anchor Text: online accounting software 60% branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: online accounting software from Sage One

Title: 40932 - # Tips for Budgeting Within Your Small Business
Direction: 675 words. Give 4-8 tips for small business owners looking to create a budget. You can give advice such as overestimating expenses, understanding your financial risks, using online accounting software to keep track of invoices, and making sure to consistently revisit and readjust your budget. Your target audience is small business owners who are looking to save and budget their company’s money. You can link to your target URL by mentioning Sage One’s online accounting software, as a great way to help keep track of invoices and make sure they are paid in full and on time.
